TopicTitle: How many screenshots have you taken?

Articles.Content:
If you don't know the real value (I'm basing it off the F1 Button method for my count, I did take a tiny few using Steam).

Nearly 2000. Yeah, I think I must of fallen asleep at the F1 button or something...

Also, feel free to share some of your best screenshots!

EDIT: Gahh, I forgot an 500-1000 option after I reworked the polls slightly.

Just pick the one you're closest to, I suppose? *shrugs*

Edited January 7, 2015 by Norpo

You're missing an option for 500-1000.

I'm at about 600, and I'm not usually much of a guy for taking screenshots in games.

Edited January 6, 2015 by pxi
I usually take pictures of eclipses that I don't expect.
I've taken 3524 screenshots, ~600mb... Don't ask why, I'm not even sure how I got that many myself.

I take screenshots fairly often, but rarely post them. There isn't anything that I've done that countless others haven't except maybe my old Laythe base. I play stock with EVE only because I like the clouds.
435 but I think I may have deleted a lot as well, I still do have my first Mun Landing. Well only if you count the craft surviving but on its side as a landing LOL.

1350 according to steam.

*Presses F12*

Someone stop me.

i have a screenshoting problem.

i usually have like 2000-4000+ screenshots EVERY INSTALL.

however, ive got a screenshot folder to like 8,000+ screenshots once, then another to 7,000+

i take screenshots of every time i start a burn to circularize my orbit when launching (i think it looks cool okay?)

also when staging (not all the time, just when a stage decides to float off movie style)

my rockets sitting on the launchpad and shortly after liftoff (also looks cool)

someone help me

and yet ive still never really been outside kerbins soi much...

i have a screenshoting problem.

That might be why

I rarely take screenshots. The last time I took a screenshot was attempting to show off a launcher I built before the NASA parts.
I have 450-500 screenshots in the web, but because I usually keep less than 10% of the screenshots I take, the real number must be over 5000.

I have thousands of KSP screenshots, and they are all spread all over in dozens of different install directories going back to 0.18. I never take screenshots in other games either, can't help myself in KSP though.
I have just over 1100.
I've only got a couple hundred. I'm always sceptical that others would be interested in my work, but there's a few projects I'm proud of, like this oneÃ¢â‚¬Â¦

2167! 2167 screenshots since 0.16. WOW. That's a huge number.

This one is one of my favourites. Almost got it.

2708. With each update since 0.24, I've copied my KSP folder elsewhere and cleared both saves and screenshots from the Steam folder. So, I can give the breakdown across versions: 1416 in 0.23 and 0.23.5 combined, 848 in 0.24, 236 in 0.25, and 118 in 0.90.

There's a reason my "What did you do today" posts tend to be so screenshot-heavy.
Only 225. I mainly take screenshots of momentous achievements and things which look pretty. Here are my highlights: http://imgur.com/a/I70Ge#0

Ive got 109, seems pitiful compared to some of you others!

This is probably one of my favourite Munar shots.
More than my free imgur album allows. Anyone know a free unlim or near unlim alternative?
So far I have 844. Sadly there's no poll option for 500-1000, so I did 1000-2000

I changed the screenshot button to 1, so I take lots of screenshots of pretty much every mission. I usually end up having to make 2 folders with 2000+ screenshots for each version of the game.

By my estimations, I have amounted roughly 40 000 screenshots during the three years I've played KSP. That's about 80Gb worth.

Yeah...

More than my free imgur album allows. Anyone know a free unlim or near unlim alternative?

I made 7 different Imgur accounts.

Edited January 6, 2015 by Giggleplex777

3207 in my combined .25 - .90 screeny folder, and I had at least 2000 each for 0.24, 0.23, 0.22, 0.21, 0.19, 0.18.... all the way back to 0.13. So I'd say in the tens of thousands. Sadly, most of them are gone.

Just a few here and there... I'd have to go count. Maybe 200 - 300? I usually take at least one of each new *finished* vessel, and now and then of some major (for me) accomplishment/landing... and of course weird stuff, such as.....

I have no clue. Assuming every episode of my multiple series got 2-3 screenshots, that's ... 500-1000 right there. I guess I'll vote for the 1000-2000.

I currently have about 7 of those still present, because I haven't deleted them yet.

More than my free imgur album allows. Anyone know a free unlim or near unlim alternative?

255 if i remember correctly.

oh and i'm gonna be that guy:

The vote numbers overlap which isn't required for absolute values - which option do I choose for 25 pictures?

And you're missing the option for 501 to 999...

(sorry)
